meanings.definition: Having the smell, taste, or appearance of fish.
meanings.sent1: The fishiest smell came from the kitchen after they cooked seafood.
meanings.sent2: The fishiest dish on the menu was the grilled salmon.
meanings.sent3: She wrinkled her nose at the fishiest odor coming from the old fridge.
meanings.sent4: The fishiest paint color for the bathroom was a shade of blue called 'Ocean Breeze'.
meanings.sent5: The fishiest taste of the soup reminded him of his fishing trip by the sea.

meanings.sent1: The fishiest part of the story was when the cat claimed it caught a fish as big as a whale.
meanings.sent2: His excuse for being late was the fishiest explanation she had ever heard.
meanings.sent3: The fishiest alibi he could come up with was blaming the missing cookies on the goldfish.
meanings.sent4: The fishiest character in the mystery novel turned out to be the quiet librarian.
meanings.sent5: The fishiest behavior at the party was when someone tried to sneak a fish into the punch bowl.
